news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 23.5! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES
  • Visual Update for Haddonfield Map (Map is re-enabled & increased chance of encountering map during 1st week of release)
  • Hemorrhage Rework
  • Updates to Boil Over, Boon: Circle of Healing & Sloppy Butcher Perks
  • Reworks to The Legion & The Ghost Face
  • Tome 11: DEVOTION of The Archives (starts April 28th 11AM ET)

    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that gave incorrect disconnection penalty
  • Fixed a hardlock when minimizing the Game during a Loading screen after a match
  • Multiple issues fixed

    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The Hex: Ruin effect is cancelled when a survivor stops repairing a generator during Feral Frenzy when equipped with the Fuming Mix Tape add-on
  • When dismissing a daily ritual, an incorrect amount of reward might be displayed. This is purely visual, and does not affect the actual amount of reward you will receive. Reopening the daily ritual window should correct this.
news.title: Release Patch Notes

news.title: TOME 10: SAW - 24 hrs left

news.description:
The Dead by Daylight team would like your feedback in a Player Satisfaction survey.

We encourage you to be as honest as possible in letting us know how you feel about the game. The information and answers provided are anonymous, not shared with any third-party, and will not be used for purposes other than survey analysis.

Access the survey HERE: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PSATg-APR22
news.title: PLAYER SATISFACTION SURVEY

news.description:
The Rift for Tome 10: SAW will close at April 6th 11AM ET.
For those without a Rift Pass, this will be the last chance to unlock it and claim any rewards you've earned on the Premium track.

Once the Rift closes the below will come into effect:
  • Challenges, Entries, and Bloodpoints from Tome 10 will remain available permanently after this date but no longer award Rift Fragments. Once the next Tome begins, Tome 10: SAW will be available in the Compendium section.
  • Player Level XP will stop awarding Rift Fragments.
  • Unclaimed rewards from the Rift will be automatically claimed on your next launch of the game or tally screen, whichever comes first.
news.title: TOME 10: SAW - 1 week left

news.title: TOME 10: SAW - 1 week left

news.description:
Spring is in season and we're looking to shake things up a bit! To thank everyone coming by for our Matchmaking Tests, we're kicking off some spring cleaning fun!
Duration: March 28th 2PM ET - April 7th 2PM ET
During this period, enjoy these incredible bonuses!

Boosted 1st Match of the Day XP Bonus
  • 300XP per role -> 1,000XP per role

    • Doubled Daily Ritual Bloodpoints
  • Affects only newly acquired Rituals
  • Note: The old value will be shown once a new ritual is received, but update when displayed again.

    • Character Sales
  • 20% off Auric Cell costs for the below Characters
  • 400 AC each - Blight, Legion, Plague / Kate, Elodie, Adam, Zarina

    • Daily Login Gifts
    All times are in Eastern starting at 2PM and ending at 2PM on the respectful days.
  • March 28th - 29th: Jake (Body) - Loner's Vest Jacket
  • March 29th - 30th: 50,000 Bloodpoints
  • March 30th - 31st: Nurse (Head) - Mourning Tears (Stifled)
  • March 31st - April 1st: 50,000 Bloodpoints
  • April 1st - 2nd: Jake (Head) - Loner's Beanie
  • April 2nd - 3rd: 50,000 Bloodpoints
  • April 3rd - 4th: Jake (Pants) - Loner's Work Slacks
  • April 4th - 5th: 50,000 Bloodpoints
  • April 5th - 6th: 50,000 Bloodpoints
  • April 6th - 7th: Nurse (Body) - A Widow's Gown (Stifled)

    • Note: The Recluse (Jake) and Bad News (Nurse) outfits will be temporarily unavailable from the store while available as login gifts.
news.title: SPRING CLEANING

news.description:
Since we launched our new matchmaking system last year, we've received a wide variety of feedback and suggestions for improvements.

With that in mind, we're asking for your help to put these suggestions to the test. Over the coming weeks, we'll be running a series of matchmaking experiments. Our goal is to find a nice balance between queue times and fairness that everyone can be happy with.

When is it?
The matchmaking experiments will take place on the following dates:
  • March 28th
  • March 29th
  • March 30th
  • March 31st
  • April 4th
  • April 7th


    • How can I help?
    Let us know how each day feels! Each day, we'll create a new forum section and ask for your thoughts.

    With your help, we look forward to improving the matchmaking system. Please submit your feedback here: forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/categories/matchmaking-tests
news.title: MMR TESTS

news.description:

news.title: MMR TESTS

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.6.2 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue which sometimes allowed purchasing of the same perk multiple times in the Shrine of Secrets
  • Fixed an issue which prevented purchasing of discounted outfits using Shards
  • Fixed an issue that caused killer being able to block the "Unhook" prompt with one of the hook in Industrial map
  • Fixed an issue that caused the makeup to be missing from Elodie's 50's Night Out outfit icon
  • Multiple other issues fixed


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.6.2 BUGFIX

news.description: As of 5.6.1, the issue causing a Purchase Cancelled message has been resolved. Players are now able to purchase Auric Cell packs in-game.
news.title: In-Game Purchases Update

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.6.1 bugfix.

Features
  • Re-enabled the Wake Up & Object of Obsession perks after a bug fix.

    • Please note that these perks will be re-enabled only after the update is available on all platforms.

    Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused survivors to be stuck between a hook and a locker in Silent Hill map
  • Fixed an issue that caused the killer not being able to pick up the survivor in the basement's stairs
  • Fixed an issue that sometimes caused daily rituals to be generated for characters which are disabled
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Killer to crash when Survivors interacted with the exit switch with the Wake Up perk equipped
  • Fixed an issue that caused a crash when unhooking a Survivor using the perks Aftercare, Object of Obsession and Empathetic Connection
  • Multiple other issues fixed


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.6.1 BUGFIX

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.6.1 bugfix.

Features
  • Re-enabled the Wake Up & Object of Obsession perks after a bug fix.

    • Please note that these perks will be re-enabled only after the update is available on all platforms.

    Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused survivors to be stuck between a hook and a locker in Silent Hill map
  • Fixed an issue that caused the killer not being able to pick up the survivor in the basement's stairs
  • Fixed an issue that sometimes caused daily rituals to be generated for characters which are disabled
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Killer to crash when Survivors interacted with the exit switch with the Wake Up perk equipped
  • Fixed an issue that caused a crash when unhooking a Survivor using the perks Aftercare, Object of Obsession and Empathetic Connection
  • Multiple other issues fixed


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.6.1 BUGFIX

news.description:
Congratulations! You made it through the first 7 days of Sadako's presence in the Fog. We thought we'd celebrate your survival with some Bloodpoints and Iridescent Shards. Claim them fast, since each log in reward expires after a day!

  • March 14th : 70,000 Bloodpoints + 170 Shards
  • March 15th : 70,000 Bloodpoints + 170 Shards
  • March 16th : 70,000 Bloodpoints + 170 Shards
  • March 17th : 70,000 Bloodpoints + 170 Shards
  • March 18th : 70,000 Bloodpoints + 170 Shards
  • March 19th : 70,000 Bloodpoints + 170 Shards
  • March 20th : 170,000 Bloodpoints + 980 Shards


    • Logging in every day gives you a total of 590,000 Bloodpoints and 2,000 Shards! Each log in reward is valid starting 11AM ET each day to 11AM ET the next day.
news.title: 7-Day Login Calendar

news.description:
The following has been temporarily disabled:

news.title: Disabled Content

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 23! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES & CONTENT
  • New Killer - The Onryo
  • New Survivor - Yoichi Asakawa
  • The Nurse is re-enabled

    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that may cause valid skill checks to be rejected under high network latency
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Nurse to be stuck and unable to move after a grab attempt after blinking is invalidated
  • Multiple other issues fixed

    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The Haddonfield map and the Strode Realty Key offering remain disabled
  • The Object of Obsession & Wake Up perks have been disabled
news.title: Release Patch Notes

news.description: Since our recent update, players attempting to purchase Auric Cells packs in-game are receiving a Purchase Cancelled message. We are currently investigating what causes that issue. In the meantime, players wishing to purchase Auric Cells packs can do it through Windows Store. We are sorry for the inconvenience and will update as soon as the issue is resolved.
news.title: In-Game Purchases

news.description:
Update: Due to a bug, discounts in Iridescent Shards are unavailable. We are planning to bring them back after the issue is fixed.

Flash Sale! Take advantage of these discounts on Characters and Outfits!

news.description:
Recently, an anti-cheat issue prevented some players from being able to play the game. After reaching out to our partners, we're pleased to say that this issue is now resolved!

As a welcome back gift, Microsoft Store players who log in before March 7, 2022 6PM ET will receive a 500,000 Bloodpoint reward.
news.title: Important: Login Issue Resolved

news.description:
Please be advised that Daily Rituals will reset for everyone as of Chapter 23 (Sadako Rising) on March 8, 2022 11AM ET.

We apologize for the inconvenience. As a thank you, please be sure to login between March 8 2022 11AM ET - March 15 2022 11AM ET for 100K Bloodpoints!
news.title: Important: Daily Rituals

news.description:

Between Feb 28 - March 7, earn 1.5x Bloodpoints from trials!

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.5.2 bugfix.

Content
  • Boil Over - Changed to give 33% of current wiggle progress when falling from great heights (was a flat 25% increase)


    • Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused some players to encounter a Grade Reset after updating to patch 5.5.1. Note: This issue was only visual
  • Fixed multiple issues affecting the Nurse


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.5.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.5.1 bugfix.

Content
  • The Coldwind Farm - Fractured Cowshed & Crotus Prenn Asylum - Father Campbell's Chapel maps have been re-enabled


    • Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused the killer music to not change properly when switching roles from a Survivor wearing a 'Modern Tales' outfit
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Cannibal & Demogorgon not to be able to break a pallet


    • Known Issues
  • The Haddonfield map and the Strode Realty Key offerings have been disabled


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.

news.description:
The Archives returns with a new Tome that asks the important question...Would you like to play a game?

Tome 10: SAW comes complete with new challenges, new rewards, and a deeper glimpse into the memories of Detective Tapp & Amanda Young (The Pig). Let the games begin...
Watch the Tome trailer here: https://youtu.be/27DRVM1M-kM

Watch the Rift trailer here: https://youtu.be/HCFlNM6UlSs

Level Release Schedule
  • Level I: January 26th 11AM ET
  • Level 2: February 9th 11AM ET
  • Level 3: February 23rd 11AM ET
  • Level 4: March 16th 11AM ET


    • Please note these release dates are subject to change. All previously unlocked levels will remain available once released but will stop providing Rift Fragments once the relevant Rift has expired.
news.title: TOME 10: SAW

news.description:
Celebrate The Year of the Tiger in Dead by Daylight!

Surprises lurk around every corner. Some exciting, others deadly. Earn new rewards by participating in the Lurking Stripes Lunar Event!

Receive a gift of 50K Bloodpoints every day from January 25th, 2:00 PM EST until February 8th, 2:00 PM EST.

In addition to daily login rewards, exciting new challenges, Lunar charms, and limited-time gameplay items, unlock exclusive cosmetics for David King, Kate Denson, Jane Romero, The Trapper, The Clown, The Artist, and The Nurse.

Happy Lunar New Year!

For more details: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/LunarEvent
news.title: LURKING STRIPES

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 22.5! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

IMPORTANT
Due to an increase in file compression, this patch required a download of almost the entire game. Thankfully, this means the game is now ~20GB smaller than usual.
This change is the first step in reducing future patch times, and we appreciate your understanding and patience as we progressively continue to improve patch times.

FEATURES
  • New Features: Interaction Behavior (Hold/Toggle) & Run to Cancel (On/Off)
  • New Wiggle Interaction (Beta, limited time)

    • CONTENT
  • "Lurking Stripes" Lunar New Year limited-time event (starts Jan 25th 2PM ET)
  • "Tome 10: SAW" of The Archives (starts Jan 26th 11AM ET)
  • New voices for Lisa Garland & Cybil Bennett Legendary cosmetics
  • New Cenobite VO lines have been added
  • Multiple updates to add-ons for: Cannibal, Clown, Pig, Twins, Nemesis, Huntress, Oni
  • Multiple updates to Survivor & Killer Perks

    • BUG FIXES
  • Multiple issues affecting The Nurse fixed

    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The Haddonfield map and the Strode Realty Key offering have been disabled
  • The Coldwind Farm - Fractured Cowshed & The Crotus Prenn Asylum - Father Campbell's Chapel maps have been disabled
news.title: PATCH NOTES
